game_description: VR Gallery ZOSU Smash: - Casual gallery view and destroy experience! - Visit a beautiful gallery and smash any painting and many objects with over 300 pastel paintings from the award winning artist Dr. James Southworth. - Simple and fun smashing ability that can be enjoyed while visiting the beautiful gallery. - Smash with swords and hammers! Bonus blade slice area and drawing canvas area. - Beautiful paintings from around the world including, Turkey, Europe, Northwest USA. - Paintings include stunning landscapes and pastel colors, as well as cityscapes and people. - Additional bonus paintings in pastel and other art mediums by Dr. Southworth and ZOSU (as marked). - Climbing is included for most areas. - Bonus object spawning station for additional smashing replayability, or simply reset the level. - Object destruction based on where objects are hit, objects take varying damage to be destroyed.
